posts.content:
I know that this will seem a little random but does anyone know the whereabouts of my dad's (Paul Belcher) old '65 split the registration number is/was EUY 203C - old members may remember my dad as the first chairman of the club and his van was originally an off white colour but was then repainted in triumph racing green and cream. the DVLA states that it is still on the road but now has a 2.2 litre lump and is painted Blue - any info would be nice.
many thanks.

It may be worth contacting Steve Saunders of the SSVC register, he may know of the van if a club member still has it.

Tom
